node.description: WMS large is a warehouse management system used in medium and large countries. It was purchased in 2001 from Redmoon software USA. We own the Source code. The module cover: Inventory Management which provides inventory information for each warehouse, Bar Code System, vendor information, Parts codes, physical inventory management. Cycle Counting to manage inventory cycle counts.
node.name: Application: WMS large

node.description: WMS light is a warehouse management system used in smaller countries. It was purchased in 2001 from Redmoon software USA. We own the Source code. The module cover: Inventory Management which provides inventory information for each warehouse, Bar Code System, vendor information, Parts codes, physical inventory management. Cycle Counting to manage inventory cycle counts.
node.name: Application: WMS light

node.name: Application: WMS special
